title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Rush returns to audio sound bite roster all about him. Democrat authoritarians want to cancel Thanksgiving and Christmas. Sidney Powell, Lin Wood, Rudy Giuliani put reputations on the line to claim provable voter fraud that will overturn the election. Obama on Rush's "business model" based on hating minorities and immigrants. Sixteen pro-life Republican women elected to House. Jurassic Park Drive-Bys Tom Brokaw and Sam Donaldson slam Rush. Every GOP candidate who flipped a House seat was a woman, minority or veteran. Anderson Cooper says Trump wants to become a "Rush Limbaugh-type figure", a kingmaker, in the GOP. The New Yorker fires Jeffrey Toobin. New Yorker's Jane Mayer says Trump can't work hard enough to be a talk show host. The left is scared to death Trump will wind up on the radio. Democrat governors ask for people to report Thanksgiving violations. Christiane Amanpour apologizes for comparing Trump to Hitler -- we don't accept it, because she meant it. It all comes back to this: Why did they stop counting votes on election night?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

If we're going to bastardize the American electoral process, let's go all the way and give Biden 100% of the votes, maybe 99%. Where we are on voter fraud investigation: Sidney Powell and Lin Wood promise there is provable voter fraud. Don't assume new websites you never heard of are a bunch of kooks. Rush's emergence on the radio blew away the Walter Cronkites and Eric Sevareids. The Democrats won't leave Trump alone after the presidency because they don't want anyone else to try what he tried. Cruz and Hawley take it to Zuckerberg and Dorsey. Sidney Powell and Lin Wood have impeccable reputations, if they were liberals they'd be among the most celebrated attorneys in the country. Why would they lie about the evidence they've seen? Dems started eroding confidence in the electoral system with the Russia hoax in 2016. Andrew Yang moves to Georgia to vote in Senate race?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

In Sidney Powell's compelling appearance on Maria Bartiromo show she insisted she's seen overwhelming evidence of fraud. Lin Wood, who represented wrongly accused Richard Jewell, was right when everyone said he was wrong. In order to believe Biden won, we have to believe people voted down ballot for GOP in overwhelming fashion, but didn't vote for Trump. Biden underperformed with black voters, but got 10 million votes more than Obama? 19 bellwether counties were wrong this time. Venezuelan Dominion voter machines used in many states were made to steal elections for Chavez. Many Democrat counties had over 90% voter turnout. Rudy explains how they're going to get these cases to the Supreme Court. The only Democrat in the country who got any votes is Joe Biden. Something went on here? Sidney Powell on overwhelming evidence. Washington Governor Inslee cancels Thanksgiving. Madison, Wisconsin bans all indoor gatherings. Caller on why Drive-Bys are focusing on Rush, not Trump.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
